name: Medic in the Middle
description:
WARNING: THE GAME IS NOT IN EXCECUTABLE FORM. It's a zip of the GameMaker project i made it in. I couldn't buy a  GameMaker subscription if i tried. If someone can pretty please export this project to a .exe it would be very great :)

Controls:

WASD: move around
Arrow keys: use healing tools
Hold Space+Arrow keys: heal self
Hold Space: use Station
Mouse: click buttons
P: pause

You have been sent to protect your very totally human friends (your boss did NOT lie to you) while they fight. Use an expansive upgradable arsenal (3) of tools to heal you and your friends!
